sentences.en: a jazz band
sentences.cn: 爵士乐队

sentences.en: a jazz club
sentences.cn: 爵士乐俱乐部

sentences.en: Ben Tankard wowed the crowd with his jazz.
sentences.cn: 本·坦卡德的爵士乐使众人为之叫绝。

sentences.en: Do you like jazz, Evan? Let me play something for you.
sentences.cn: 埃文，你喜欢爵士乐吗？让我为你奏一曲。

sentences.en: He was one of the most influential perfor-mers of modern jazz.
sentences.cn: 他是现代爵士乐最有影响力的表演者之一。

sentences.en: He's one of the most dynamically imaginative jazz pianists still functioning.
sentences.cn: 他是当下仍旧活跃的最有闯劲、最具想象力的爵士乐钢琴师之一。

sentences.en: His music fused the rhythms of jazz with classical forms.
sentences.cn: 他的音乐把爵士乐的节奏和古典乐的形式结合在了一起。

sentences.en: I do not like modern jazz .
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢现代爵士乐。

sentences.en: I'll occasionally go to a local jazz evening with a friend.
sentences.cn: 我有时会跟朋友去参加当地的爵士乐之夜。

sentences.en: It was jazz music he loved, its syncopations.
sentences.cn: 他喜爱爵士乐，喜欢它的切分音。

sentences.en: jazz up an all-white kitchen with red tiles.
sentences.cn: 用红瓷砖把全白的厨房布置得更有生气。

sentences.en: jazzed up the living area with beaded curtains.
sentences.cn: 用串珠窗帘装饰房间，使它变得有生气

sentences.en: Louis Armstrong defined jazz pithily as "what I play for a living".
sentences.cn: 路易斯·阿姆斯特朗把爵士乐简明扼要地定义为“我一门糊口的手艺”。

sentences.en: Marsalis has a formidable reputation in both jazz and classical music.
sentences.cn: 马萨利斯在爵士乐和古典音乐领域都有极高的声望。

sentences.en: modern jazz
sentences.cn: 现代爵士乐

sentences.en: Musicians blast their brassy jazz from street corners.
sentences.cn: 玩音乐的人在街角大声弹奏起尖锐刺耳的爵士乐。

sentences.en: oh, love, life, and all that jazz.
sentences.cn: 呵，爱情，生命，以及诸如此类之物。

sentences.en: Page is well versed in many styles of jazz.
sentences.cn: 佩奇精通多种风格的爵士乐。

sentences.en: Stephen and I are going to jazz up the love songs.
sentences.cn: 斯蒂芬和我打算给那些爱情歌曲注入流行元素。

sentences.en: The sound veers between jazz and countrified blues.
sentences.cn: 音乐在爵士乐和乡村布鲁斯乐之间来回转换。

sentences.en: Two people played jazz on a piano.
sentences.cn: 两人联手在一架钢琴上演奏爵士乐。

sentences.en: We're thinking of going to a jazz club tonight.
sentences.cn: 我们正在考虑今晚去爵士乐俱乐部。

sentences.en: When Miles Davis died, jazz was robbed of its most distinctive voice.
sentences.cn: 随着迈尔斯·戴维斯的去世，爵士乐界失去了其最与众不同的声音。

sentences.en: Why not dance a jazz for us?
sentences.cn: 为何不为我们跳支爵士舞呢？

words.tran_cn: 爵士乐的；奔放的；花哨的
奏爵士乐，跳爵士舞；游荡

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)以及诸如此类的东西
使更活泼热烈；使更兴高采烈；使更有生气
使有生气：使更有趣；使活泼
犹他爵士队（美国篮球队）

trans.tran_en: a type of music that has a strong beat and parts for performers to play alone

trans.tran_cn: 奏爵士乐，跳爵士舞；游荡
